@auspost or only knock/ring at a more respectable time. 6am is not a respectable or acceptable time
@auspost right for who? I don't want that. It is highly disruptive to those sleeping. You only need to knock or ring if you need a signature
@auspost it is not the first time you have unnecessarily and unfairly woken my household for no need #frustrated #angry
@auspost for delivery of a parcel that does not require a signature to a home, please DO NOT ring the doorbell at 6am. Just drop the parcel.
